sentence: How does the pig farmer get to the fair? he rides piggyback.
explanation: The word pig can refer to the animal itself or can be used to describe a greedy or gluttonous person.
first_new_sentence: The pig in the pen looked healthy and well-fed.
second_new_sentence: He was acting like a pig, taking more than his fair share of the food.

sentence: Did you hear the creator of spaghetti died? he pasta way
explanation: The word pasta can refer to the Italian dish made from wheat and water, or it can be used in a general sense to describe any similar dough-based food.
first_new_sentence: I made a delicious pasta for dinner last night.
second_new_sentence: She mentioned she needs to work on her pasta art for the competition.

sentence: Where do sperm go to die when you jack off? the sementary.
explanation: The word semen relates to the fluid containing sperm, while sementary plays on the word cemetery, a place for the dead.
first_new_sentence: The doctor explained that semen production is a natural process in mens bodies.
second_new_sentence: He visited the local cemetery to pay his respects.
